holidays.title: National Homemade Cookie Day
holidays.description: Bakers, homemakers, and cookie enthusiasts, preheat your ovens to serve up these delicious treats.

holidays.title: World Vegetarian Day
holidays.description: Did you know that approximately 10% of the world's population is vegetarian?

holidays.title: Ancestors' Day
holidays.description: It is Pchum Ben and time to feed the hungry ghosts of our ancestors.

holidays.title: Balloons Around the World Day
holidays.description: You don’t need to be good at party tricks to perform these balloon activities!

holidays.title: CD Player Day
holidays.description: Take a trip down memory lane to listen to music sans 'playlists'.

holidays.title: China National Day
holidays.description: Put on your patriotic hat as we get ready to ring in China National Day.

holidays.title: Cyprus Independence Day
holidays.description: Gather your family and friends — it’s time to observe Cyprus Independence Day!

holidays.title: Filipino American History Month
holidays.description: Celebrating the history, heritage, and culture of the Filipino-American community.

holidays.title: ​International Day of Older Persons
holidays.description: Older people are fonts of wisdom, experience, and storytelling.

holidays.title: International Music Day
holidays.description: Find out how music can contribute towards creating a more harmonious society.

holidays.title: Investiture Ceremony of the Captains Regent
holidays.description: Hit the streets as we celebrate the historic Investiture Ceremony of the Captain’s Regent.

holidays.title: Model T Day
holidays.description: Pay homage to the legendary Henry Ford by remembering one of his most revolutionary creations.

holidays.title: National Black Dog Day
holidays.description: See that picture? Go ahead and say it, "awwwww!"

holidays.title: National Day of China
holidays.description: The celebrations of National Day of China are a part of China’s “Golden Week.”

holidays.title: National Fire Pup Day
holidays.description: Dogs have historically worked, lived, and slept alongside members of local fire departments.

holidays.title: National Fruit at Work Day
holidays.description: This day celebrates every fruit that has given us its delicious juiciness and boost in work performance.

holidays.title: National Hair Day
holidays.description: Celebrate your personality as personified by your hair and explore ways to keep it lustrously healthy.

holidays.title: National Lace Day
holidays.description: If you have ever dreamed of a lace wedding dress, then this holiday is for you.

holidays.title: National Poetry Day
holidays.description: "Roses are red, violets are blue, we are so happy, to be celebrating poetry with you!"

holidays.title: National Raccoon Day
holidays.description: Raccoons might not be the best pets, but they are no pests either.

holidays.title: Nigeria Independence Day
holidays.description: Don your best green and white clothes and spend the day celebrating Nigerian Independence!

holidays.title: Pchum Ben
holidays.description: Pchum Ben marks the start of the journey of souls to purgatory.

holidays.title: ROK Alliance Day
holidays.description: We commemorate the alliance treaty signing between the United States and the Republic of Korea today.

holidays.title: Teacher's Day in Uzbekistan
holidays.description: On Teacher’s Day in Uzbekistan, we join the nation in recognizing and honoring educators and teachers.

holidays.title: Tuvalu Independence Day
holidays.description: Read on to learn how this island nation got its independence from its British colonial masters.

holidays.title: World Sake Day
holidays.description: Get your best sake, invite your family and friends, and celebrate the day together.

holidays.title: Brie Larson’s Birthday
holidays.description: At just six, she became the youngest person to get into the American Conservatory Theater.

holidays.title: Delianna Urena’s Birthday
holidays.description: This Instagram star has opened two successful businesses and her following continues to grow.

holidays.title: Dorian Hunter’s Birthday
holidays.description: Chef Dorian proves that one decision can lead to your dreams coming true!

holidays.title: Drew Chadwick’s Birthday
holidays.description: Learn more about this talented rapper whose fame is on the rise.

holidays.title: FGTeeV Chase’s Birthday
holidays.description: FGTeeV Chase is an active and outgoing kid who first appeared on camera at age two!

holidays.title: Isis King’s Birthday
holidays.description: This transgender model walked so that others in her community would be able to run!

holidays.title: Julie Andrews’s Birthday
holidays.description: Julie Andrews has built a successful acting career in the course of 75 years.

holidays.title: Jurnee Smollett-Bell’s Birthday
holidays.description: She's gone from a little girl to a hot mama with a long list of achievements!

holidays.title: Latisha Scott’s Birthday
holidays.description: We celebrate this strong business-minded reality star, for whom the sky is the limit.

holidays.title: Matthew Daddario’s Birthday
holidays.description: The handsome "Shadowshunter" actor has always been the one to look forward to on the screen!

holidays.title: Myles Parrish’s Birthday
holidays.description: Could this talented YouTube star and singer be the next big thing in the music industry?

holidays.title: Nathaniel Drew’s Birthday
holidays.description: The rise of this YouTube star has wowed us in ways we never imagined.

holidays.title: Peter Thomas’s Birthday
holidays.description: This reality star started his career in the music world, gained experience, and built several businesses.

holidays.title: Priah Ferguson’s Birthday
holidays.description: She’s young, talented, and has plenty in store for her rising acting career!

holidays.title: RD Benji’s Birthday
holidays.description: This talented YouTube star is one post away from true greatness and fame.

holidays.title: Zach Galifianakis’s Birthday
holidays.description: This hilarious actor has created a timeless legacy that will remain relevant.
